comment._content: This is in Kowloon Tong near what was then the old Kai Tak Airport. The street the facilities are on is called Broadcast Drive. The Kowloon studio is still there.The mountain in the background with the large block-looking pattern is know as "checkerboard hill" because the hill would be an important  marker for pilots who were flying in and out of Kai Tak which was located right in the middle of the very built up urban dwelling of  Kowloon City which is very near to Kowloon Tong.
